name: bot-relay
description: send bot messages to real users, real name should bot-relay

scripts.unit-test: node `npm bin`/istanbul test `npm bin`/_mocha -- test/bootstrap.js test/unit/**/*.test.js
scripts.integration-test: node `npm bin`/istanbul test `npm bin`/_mocha -- test/bootstrap.js test/integration/**/*.test.js
scripts.functional-test: node `npm bin`/istanbul test `npm bin`/_mocha -- test/bootstrap.js test/functional/**/*.test.js
scripts.coverage: `npm bin`/istanbul cover `npm bin`/_mocha --report lcovonly -- test/bootstrap.js test/unit/**/*.test.js && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
